blogPost.excerpt: Turn your browser bookmarks into embedded cards and watch YouTube/Vimeo videos, listen to audio, see images, read articles and more right from one dashboard. Now offers : • Nested folders • Link shortener • Saving links as PDF • Highlighting text on web
blogPost.body: Turn your browser bookmarks into embedded cards and watch YouTube/Vimeo videos, listen to audio, see images, read articles and more right from one dashboard. Now offers : • Nested folders • Link shortener • Saving links as PDF • Highlighting text on web
blogPost.title: linkish - Turn boring bookmarks into embedded audio & video cards
blogPost.author: Akash Joshi

localize.description: 将浏览器书签变成内嵌卡，只需从一个仪表盘就可以观看YouTube/Vimeo视频、收听音频、查看图像、阅读文章等。现在提供：·嵌套文件夹·链接缩短器·将链接另存为PDF·突出显示Web上的文本
localize.tagline: 将枯燥乏味的书签变成嵌入式声卡和视频卡

localize.description: 將瀏覽器書籤變成內嵌卡，只需從一個儀表盤就可以觀看YouTube/Vimeo視頻、收聽音頻、查看圖像、閱讀文章等。現在提供：·嵌套文件夾·鏈接縮短器·將鏈接另存爲PDF·突出顯示Web上的文本
localize.tagline: 將枯燥乏味的書籤變成嵌入式聲卡和視頻卡

previous.excerpt: Malist – simple browser extension that takes your email book to a browser. Whenever you need somebody's email, simply click the button in the toolbar and get the email. No more need to ask for an email over and over again or to search in the contact book.
previous.title: Malist - Your email book in a browser

localize.description: Malist-简单的浏览器扩展，可将您的电子邮件书带到浏览器。当您需要某人的电子邮件时，只需单击工具栏中的按钮即可收到电子邮件。不再需要一遍又一遍地索要电子邮件，也不再需要在通讯录中搜索。
localize.tagline: 浏览器中的电子邮件薄

localize.description: Malist-簡單的瀏覽器擴展，可將您的電子郵件書帶到瀏覽器。當您需要某人的電子郵件時，只需單擊工具欄中的按鈕即可收到電子郵件。不再需要一遍又一遍地索要電子郵件，也不再需要在通訊錄中搜索。
localize.tagline: 瀏覽器中的電子郵件薄

next.excerpt: Use StoryLines to track milestones and funding events throughout your funding story. As your StoryLine grows, share your progress on social or publish it our StoryLine directory.
next.title: StoryLines by FundStory - Share key events throughout your funding story

localize.description: 使用故事情节来跟踪整个资助故事中的里程碑和资助事件。随着故事情节的发展，请在社交网站上分享您的进展，或者将其发布到我们的故事情节目录中。
localize.tagline: 在您的整个融资故事中分享关键事件

localize.description: 使用故事情節來跟蹤整個資助故事中的里程碑和資助事件。隨着故事情節的發展，請在社交網站上分享您的進展，或者將其發佈到我們的故事情節目錄中。
localize.tagline: 在您的整個融資故事中分享關鍵事件
